units.title: Flow cytometry sorting of living cells
units.text: Representative flow strategy utilized to collect the living cell fraction, negative for propidium iodide (PI) and positive for Hoechst.
units.rationale: Describes the cell sorting step used to isolate viable cells.

units.title: EdU proliferation assay on organoid lines
units.text: EdU assay clonal organoid lines at P6 and P10; n = 1 pediatric small intestinal ileal organoid showing proliferating cells localized at the crypt-like structure bases (scale control; mean ± s.e.m.).
units.rationale: Specifies the EdU labeling procedure to assess proliferation in organoids.

units.title: Disaccharidase activity functional evaluation
units.text:
Functional evaluation of disaccharidase activity (n = 2 bar, 50 μm).
Immunofluorescent staining highlights proliferative marker Ki67 (scale bar, paired t-test).
units.rationale: Indicates the assay performed to measure enzymatic activity in organoid samples.

units.title: Long-term KAFO culture imaging
units.text: Phase-contrast images showing long-term KAFO culture (scale bar, 200 μm). n = 5 independent biological samples; mean ± s.e.m.; *P = 0.0121, two-tailed paired t-test.
units.rationale: Documents the imaging of extended organoid culture for phenotypic assessment.

units.title: Expansion and cryopreservation of organoids
units.text:
expanded up to passage 20 and successfully cryopreserved,
Using single-cell sequencing, we investigated human AF epithelial cells 89.7% of AF samples, with a median formation efficiency of
units.rationale: Reports the passage limit and cryopreservation step for organoid maintenance.

units.title: Derivation of fetal epithelial organoids from amniotic fluid
units.text: autologous primary fetal organoids from AF and TF, sampled for clinical and applying established culture techniques.
units.rationale: Summarizes the overall method for generating fetal organoids from fluid samples.
